widget.header: Jose Ramos Was Honored With the Professional Merit Award

config: Jose Ramos Mateos received the Professional Merit Award from the University of Ixtlahuaca CUI. This accolade recognizes Jose's trajectory and efforts in fostering the Mazahua language and culture through education, literature, and radio broadcasting in Mexico and other countries. Jose also talked about his professional work at Justia, including the organization's mission, free legal resources, and the Justia Mexico Portal.
